articles.description: The XRSpace Mova is a new virtual reality headset that looks straight out of the film Ready Player One, boasting a number of ‘world first’ features.
articles.content: The XRSpace Mova is a new virtual reality headset that looks like its straight out of Ready Player One, boasting a number of world first features with the potential to finally make VR appealing to th… [+6657 chars]
